com.cjsavage.java.net.discovery

Interface ServiceFinder.Listener

  • Enclosing class:
    ServiceFinder

    public static interface ServiceFinder.Listener
    Interface for receiving details of discovered servers and state change events for the ServiceFinder.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void listenStateChanged(ServiceFinder finder, boolean listening)
      Called when the listening state of this ServiceFinder changes.
      void serverFound(ServiceInfo serviceInfo, int requestId, ServiceFinder finder)
      Called when a server responds with connection details for a service.

    • Method Detail

      • serverFound

        void serverFound(ServiceInfo serviceInfo,
               int requestId,
               ServiceFinder finder)
        Called when a server responds with connection details for a service.
        Parameters:
        serviceInfo - information about the service
        requestId - the ID sent with the request this response is to
        finder - the ServiceFinder that received the response

      • listenStateChanged

        void listenStateChanged(ServiceFinder finder,
                      boolean listening)
        Called when the listening state of this ServiceFinder changes.
        Parameters:
        finder - the ServiceFinder who's state changed
        listening - true if the ServiceFinder is listening for responses
